logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Before insert case database call", payload: #[payload]

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Covid Case Master
db:insert.db:sql: insert into cvd_case_master(source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by) values(:source, :case_type, :first_name, :last_name, :phone, :email, TO_DATE(:date_of_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :national_id, :national_id_type, :street_address, :city, :state, :postal, :country, TO_DATE(:create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(:update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :create_by, :update_by)

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Completed insert case database call"

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Before update case database call", payload: #[payload]

db:update.doc:name: Update Covid Case Master
db:update.db:sql: update cvd_case_master set source=:source, case_type=:case_type, first_name=:first_name, last_name=:last_name, phone=:phone, email=:email, date_of_birth=TO_DATE(:date_of_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), national_id=:national_id, national_id_type=:national_id_type, street_address=:street_address, city=:city, state=:state, postal=:postal, country=:country, update_date=TO_DATE(:update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), create_by=:create_by, update_by=:update_by where case_id=:case_id

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Completed update case database call"

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: Before fetching case reports database call"

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: Completed fetch case reports database call"

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: "Before fetching case by national id database call"

db:select.doc:name: Select Case by NationalID
db:select.db:sql: select case_id, source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date from cvd_case_master where national_id = :national_id

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationID], message: Completed fetch case by national id database call"
